title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - | AIP client and scanner data available in Audit and Activity explorer (US Government clouds)
description:
Azure Information Protection (AIP) customers can now access data in Microsoft Purview compliance portal Audit logs and Activity explorer, in addition to the AIP Analytics portal. This means that all data logged via AIP client and AIP scanner can be witnessed along with the rest of the Microsoft Purview Information Protection and Data Loss Prevention data sets from native Office apps and other cloud resources.
GA date: December CY2021
